item.title: What to expect from Indian stock market in September after Modi-Xi meeting, SCO Summit 2025?

review.headline_rewrite: What to expect from Indian stock market in September after Modi-Xi meeting, SCO Summit 2025?
bullets: Stock market today: Indian benchmarks - Sensex and Nifty 50 - extended their gains for a second straight session on Tuesday, September 2, supported
Over the past two days, the Sensex has climbed more than 900 points, while the Nifty 50 has regained the 24,700 mark.
By around 11 AM on Tuesday, the Sensex was up 355 points, or 0.44 per cent, at 80,719, and the Nifty 50 advanced 114

bullets: We are living in unprecedented times, global policy turmoil has created huge uncertainty.

item.title: Suzlon's S144 wind turbines record lowest carbon footprint

review.headline_rewrite: Suzlon's S144 wind turbines record lowest carbon footprint
bullets: + 314.49 + 104.15 + 27.00 + 198.00 + 165.00 Renewable energy solutions provider Suzlon on Tuesday said its 'Made in India' wind turbine
Suzlon has redesigned the turbine to cut steel use by 2.5 times, incorporating recycled steel and scrap, while sourcing 83.25 per cent of components
